subscription.title: Subscribe to MiMi AI
subscription.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs. We offer a variety of options to meet different requirements and budgets.

enterprise.name: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.description: Designed for professional teams and businesses

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I choose the right plan for me?
faq.a1: Consider your usage frequency and the features you need. The Free Plan is great for first-time users, the Pro Plan is ideal for frequent users, and the Enterprise Plan is perfect for teams needing custom solutions.
faq.q2: Can I change or cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change or cancel your subscription anytime in your account settings. Monthly subscriptions can be canceled before the end of the month, and annual subscriptions will remain active until the end of the subscription period.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers in some regions. Enterprise customers can opt for invoice payments.
faq.q4: What happens if I upgrade my subscription?
faq.a4: When you upgrade, we will prorate the cost difference for the remaining days. You only pay the difference for the upgraded plan without being double-charged.
